desc:
Can an email automatically be sent to the conveyancer chosen once the estate agent has processed the application.
This will at least make the conveyancer aware that there is a bridging finance deal that the Agent/Agency would like to process.
In the body of the email it should explain that the: 

â€¢	Agent/Agency would like to bridge, the amount and the seller and purchaser names.
â€¢	Contact details of SearchWorks and PA
â€¢	A 0.5% commission earned on Settled Loans

The next step would then be for PA to contact the conveyancer and confirm if all is in order and explain the process.
